需要转义的字符：A \& B, 100\%, \$5, \#1, a\_b, \{x\}, \textasciitilde{}user, x\textasciicircum{}2, C:\textbackslash{}path\textbackslash{}file。

    \centering
    \includegraphics{assets/a\_b.png}
\end{figure}
